definitions.definition: A ridge or lump on the skin, as caused by a blow.
A strip , especially one around the edge of something (for example, in some old heraldry).

subdefinitions.definition: A strip of leather set into the seam between the outsole of a shoe and the upper , through which these parts are joined by stitching or stapling.
A strip of material or covered cord applied to a seam or garment edge to strengthen or cover it.
In steam boilers and sheet-iron work, a strip riveted upon the edges of plates that form a butt joint .
In carpentry , a strip of wood fastened over a flush seam or joint, or an angle, to strengthen it.
In machine-made stockings , a strip, or flap, of which the heel is formed.

definitions.definition: A shoe made with a welt ( strip of leather set into the seam ) .

main_definition: A ridge or lump on the skin, as caused by a blow.
secondary_definitions: A strip , especially one around the edge of something (for example, in some old heraldry).
( obsolete , shoemaking ) A shoe made with a welt ( strip of leather set into the seam ) .
